fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Throw your kill potion at a player. 1 use.
- Throw your heal potion at a player. 1 use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You always take your action after everyone else's actions are locked.
- You learn who is being targeted by a factional kill, and by which faction. After that, you may take your night action.
